Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick expressed disappointment over the Lakers' defensive performance and called for more pride defensively.
The Lakers were trailing 67-53 at halftime and faced a seven-point deficit, which turned into a 12-point loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers have the fourth-worst defensive rating in the league this season.
The team will depend on players like Cam Reddish, Max Christie, and Jaxson Hayes to improve defense.
